nodes.text: Condor dragons were a species of creature native to the moon of Endor. The Ewoks of Bright Tree Village on Endor posted watchers in the forest canopy above their homes to watch out for condor dragons.

Condor dragons were originally created for the Star Wars Legends movie Ewoks: The Battle for Endor, which was released in 1985. The species was confirmed to be canon in the reference book Ultimate Star Wars which was released in 2015.
